lead_paragraph: Haas Formula One driver Esteban Gutierrez will use the team's spare car at this weekend's Bahrain Grand Prix after the one he crashed in Australia was damaged further by a recovery crane removing it from the track.

headline.print_headline: Gutierrez Says Chassis Cracked by Crane After Crash
headline.main: Gutierrez Says Chassis Cracked by Crane After Crash

snippet: Haas Formula One driver Esteban Gutierrez will use the team's spare car at this weekend's Bahrain Grand Prix after the one he crashed in Australia was damaged further by a recovery crane removing it from the track....
